page.title: 13EDUCATION
page.content:
{Sheriffhales County Primary School. Sheriffhales school has 3 classes. The desks are not in rows they are in blocks. The teachers are not as strict they do not give you the cane anymore. It is banned. We have outside toilets and a cloakroom for each class. The Infant class is quite new it was built in 1968 and the Junior's class was built in 1848. We have display boards in the class and we display all our work. We also do art. In our school we have a computer which you can learn on and do Maths.It is a BBC model 'B'.
By Louise Millett.
